channel.title: Match IP Command

item.title: Match IP Command
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I created a command with help of my buddy (Davidi2). It checks if anyone if double logging.
Lets say for Starter tranferring.
How command works - ::matchip (first username) (second username)
but it doesnt support usernames with 2 words. How can i fix it.

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("matchip")) { String user1 = cmd[1]; String user2 = cmd[2]; Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(user1)]; Player p3 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(user2)]; if (Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket).equals(Server.socketListener.getAddress(p3.socket.socket))) { p.message("IP - MATCHED!"); } else { p.message("IP - NOT MATCHED!"); } }

Read full topic
